message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a rare opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand that you're on a tight budget, but I'm afraid I won't be able to sell it to you for $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $11000. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
